channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Threatens Iran With ‘Massive Armada’ and Presses a Set of Demands
item.description: U.S. and European officials say they have put three demands in front of the Iranians, including a permanent end to all enrichment of uranium.

item.title: Republicans Gave ICE a Slush Fund. Democrats Want to Limit It.

item.title: The FBI conducts a search at the Fulton County election office in Georgia

item.title: Inside the Trump administration's effort to reverse climate change policies

item.title: Fed holds interest rates steady, taking a pause from rate cuts to assess the economy

item.title: Michael Mayo's 'Fly' is a soaring testament to his artistry and creative vision

item.title: Fed Holds Rates Steady as It Points to an Improving Economy
item.description: The Federal Reserve chose to pause rate cuts, even as it faces relentless attacks from President Trump for not cutting borrowing costs fast enough.

item.title: Tesla Profit Slumps, but Investors May Not Care
item.description: The electric vehicle maker’s shares are near record highs as Wall Street focuses on the company’s plans for robots and self-driving cars.

item.title: Trump’s Political Drama With Powell Overshadows Fed Rate Decision

item.title: Landslide Leaves Town in Sicily Perched on a Cliff’s Edge
item.description: “We are in a movie, in a horror film,” said a resident of Niscemi, where a widening chasm is threatening the town’s historic center.

item.title: Canada’s New Reality
item.description: What can we learn from Canada’s pivot away from the U.S.?
